--- new_constructor.sql
NEW googlesql.examples.music.Chart(key AS rank, name AS chart_name)
--- AST

  New:  0,
  Type: &ast.NamedType{
    Path: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 4,
        NameEnd: 13,
        Name:    "googlesql",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 14,
        NameEnd: 22,
        Name:    "examples",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 23,
        NameEnd: 28,
        Name:    "music",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 29,
        NameEnd: 34,
        Name:    "Chart",
      },
    },
  },
  Args: []*ast.AsExpr{
    &ast.AsExpr{
      Expr: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 35,
        NameEnd: 38,
        Name:    "key",
      },
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 42,
        NameEnd: 46,
        Name:    "rank",
      },
    },
    &ast.AsExpr{
      Expr: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 48,
        NameEnd: 52,
        Name:    "name",
      },
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 56,
        NameEnd: 66,
        Name:    "chart_name",
      },
    },
  },
  Rparen: 66,
}

--- SQL
NEW googlesql.examples.music.Chart(key AS rank, name AS chart_name)
